A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Conceptually\, it'S AN INTERESTING APPROACH TO MOVE ON THEMATICALLY FROM THE MOVIES UNTIL NOW\, BUT HALF WAY THROUGH THE NEW TRILOGY\, BRIDGING THE PREVIOUS MOVIES\, SEEMS AN AWFULLY STRANGE TIME TO DO THAT. The real problems with this movie ULTIMATELY boil down is simply poorly DEVELOPED characters & a poorly told story.
